name: Alex Jefferson
learned: I am a research scientist at the International Development Institute, focusing on sustainable urban development. I enjoy hiking and photography in my free time.
currently: I am working on a project to improve urban sustainability in New York City.
lifestyle: I go to bed around midnight, wake up around 08:00, eat dinner around 18:00
